Date.description: The date of the stock data, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD

Open.description: The opening price of the stock for the given date

High.description: The highest price of the stock for the given date

Low.description: The lowest price of the stock for the given date

Close.description: The closing price of the stock for the given date

Volume.description: The number of shares traded in the stock for the given date

Stock Name.description: The ticker symbol for the stock

value_dict.RAIZ4.SA: Ticker symbol for Raia Drogasil, a Brazilian drugstore company.
value_dict.VALE3.SA: Ticker symbol for Vale, a Brazilian multinational corporation in the metals and mining industry.
